sentences.english: He had a cringing manner but a very harsh voice.
sentences.chinese: 他有卑屈諂媚的神情，但是聲音卻十分粗沙。

sentences.english: She did all this with the same compressed lips, and the same stony look .
sentences.chinese: 她做着這些事情，依然是咬緊了嘴脣，神情十分嚴肅。

sentences.english: The boatman nodded towards the north of the bay with some disdain.
sentences.chinese: 船老大略帶輕蔑神情朝海灣北部點了點頭。

sentences.english: He looked at me in blank amazement.
sentences.chinese: 他帶着迷茫驚詫的神情望着我。

sentences.english: It is a virgin looking like a woman.
sentences.chinese: 那是一個以婦人的神情望人的處子。

sentences.english: He looked taut, nervous, often miserable.
sentences.chinese: 他看起來緊張不安，時常流露出痛苦神情。

sentences.english: He threw me a smile that telegraphed consent.
sentences.chinese: 他朝我微笑，流露出同意的神情。

sentences.english: He was beginning to look thinner and very discouraged.
sentences.chinese: 他逐漸地看上赴越來越瘦，然而而且神情沮喪。

sentences.english: He spoke with firmness, but his face was very sad and his eyes were dim.
sentences.chinese: 他講得很堅定，但臉色很悽傷，雙眼閃出悲觀的神情。

sentences.english: The way most people look at you, you'd think a trashman was a monster.
sentences.chinese: 人們看你的那種神情，就好象清潔工是怪物似的。

sentences.english: We noticed a look of vacancy on his face .
sentences.chinese: 我們覺查到他臉上有一種茫然若失的神情。

sentences.english: Brent's wide ingenuous face was puzzled and mildly indignant.
sentences.chinese: 布倫特那張老實巴交的寬臉上呈現迷惑神情。

sentences.english: One realtor I know occasionally comes home discouraged, but she has an agreement with her husbanc.
sentences.chinese: 一位房地產經紀人帶着沮喪的神情回到家裏。

sentences.english: When he left to go up the line, they looked at him with a solemn expression.
sentences.chinese: 當他出發去前線的時候，他們用嚴肅的神情望着他。

sentences.english: She is saddened by the death of her little dog.
sentences.chinese: 她神情悲慼，因爲她的小狗死了。

sentences.english: His mood shifted suddenly; his eyes turned brooding.
sentences.chinese: 他的語氣忽然一變，眼神轉爲沉思的神情。

definition: expression or emotion showing in one's eyes/meaningful glance/wink/eyesight (dialect)
to have heard what was said
